trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Kohm Noskh gazes upon you with sorrowful eyes.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_TODO_00<tab>Slay the bellicose broodmother.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_TODO_01<tab>Report to Kohm Noskh.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_000<tab>Tiny traveler... Thou hast traversed the great expanse to stand before me. I ask thee─on thy journey, didst thou find strength?
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_001<tab>None here have been spared the torment of loss...yet even tragedy cometh not in equal measure.

TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_002<tab>Nay, of all my kin, the broodsires feel it most deeply. Eggs crushed before their eyes, hatchlings twisted beyond recognition...they cannot be blamed for turning to madness.

TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_003<tab>One I would have you slay, for mine own power sufficeth not to end her suffering. She yet wandereth, restless, near the ash-choked lake, though naught but poison is to be found there now...
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_004<tab>The lake lieth beyond the vitrified fort. End the broodmother's suffering, I beg thee...
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_BALLOON_000_005<tab>Thou... Thou art the murderer of my children!
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_BALLOON_000_006<tab>Long... So long have I been weary...
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_010<tab>Thy countenance speaketh volumes... I thank thee.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_011<tab>The metal demons struck without warning... Beautiful and pitiless as falling stars.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_012<tab>We fought, yes... Yet for all our savagery, we failed to protect the young. What few survived emerged from their eggs disfigured and screaming...
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_013<tab>Would that fate had taken a different course. We might have welcomed them to this world together, and guided them unto a brilliant future...
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_Q1_000_014<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_A1_000_001<tab>Midgardsormr's children live on.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_A1_000_002<tab>There are still dragons on my star.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_A1_000_003<tab>I have encountered young dragons in my travels.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_015<tab>So the young have found their place elsewhere... Our kind shall live on.
TEXT_AKTKZJ001_04337_KOHMNOSKH_100_016<tab>I am gladdened to hear not all was in vain. May thy path lead thee true, traveler.
